query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `compliance_audit_log` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `user_id` int NOT NULL,
  `entity_type` enum('employee','visa_compliance','nitaqat_status','work_permit','labor_law_config','compliance_alert','scheduled_report','import_history','other') NOT NULL,
  `entity_id` int,
  `action` enum('create','update','delete','rollback','approve','reject') NOT NULL,
  `field_changed` varchar(255),
  `value_before` text,
  `value_after` text,
  `change_reason` text,
  `ip_address` varchar(45),
  `user_agent` text,
  `created_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `users`(`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX `userId_idx` (`user_id`),
  INDEX `entityType_idx` (`entity_type`),
  INDEX `entityId_idx` (`entity_id`),
  INDEX `action_idx` (`action`),
  INDEX `createdAt_idx` (`created_at`)
)
